titleStmt.title: Archæologiæ Atticæ libri tres. = Three bookes of the Attick antiquities Containing the description of the citties glory, government, division of the people, and townes within the Athenian territories, their religion, superstition, sacrifices, account of their yeare, as also a full relation of their iudicatories. By Francis Rous scholler of Merton Colledge in Oxon.
Archæologiæ Atticæ. Books 1-3.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, b. 1615.
